Action.author: sehoonyang
Action.body: I tried to implement validation logic for high throughput which is included in the fabric-samples. So I used range query to iterate through composite keys. I did it by change default validation logic. (in file core/handlers/validation/builtin/v12/validation_logic.go; I have failed to do it with plugin) (https://github.com/SeHoonYang/fabric/commit/6b7ddc27f8ea84c12133fb6562fe16643b7a7921)
